attributes.action: The Government should Improve the pay offer to Nurses, it is richly deserved.
attributes.additional_details: No one can deny through their efforts and countless hours of work that it is not deserved, we the people owe them so much, and deserve more than then the Government offered, they deserve it.
attributes.background: The Nurses have been under huge pressure for over a year through the outbreak of the corona19 virus, we believe through their actions they have gone above and beyond their normal duties in their dedication to saving so many lives from this dreadful disease.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
